In the visions of the prophets of old the Lord of glory was represented as bestowing special light upon His church 
                                                                           717
in the days of darkness and unbelief preceding His second coming. As the Sun of Righteousness, He was to arise upon His church, "with healing in His wings." Malachi 4:2. And from every true disciple was to be diffused an influence for life, courage, helpfulness, and true healing.
